name: Tropico 5: Gone Green
storyline: It’s an endless struggle trying to please the people of Tropico – and this time El Presidente needs to go green in order to get out of trouble. Of course, this is all to protect the funds of his Swiss bank account – which are obtained through the simple method of exporting ludicrously large amounts of crude oil to competing superpowers. Help El Prez promote a better image of the island by building 100% eco-friendly windfarms as a cheap and renewable source of energy and turn Tropico into a positive showcase of modern sustainability.
summary: Tropico 5: Gone Green includes a new standalone scenario, a new building, a new dynasty avatar accessory, a new sandbox map, and a new music track and additional voice recordings.
